docs.lead_paragraph: THE most prevalent form of high blood pressure, a life-threatening illness that affects many millions of Americans, is really a group of diverse maladies rather than a single ailment, scientists have concluded from a large accumulation of evidence.

headline.main: Hypertension Found to Be Two Diverse Conditions; Puzzling Phenomenon

docs.abstract: Scientists rept that hypertension is group of diverse maladies rather than single ailment; say forms are differentiated by levels of renin in blood; Dr John H Laragh (NY Hosp-Cornell Med Center) proposes new diagnostic strategy to deal with 2 major types and some intermediate forms; disease is major factor in heart attacks and strokes (M)
docs.snippet: THE most prevalent form of high blood pressure, a life-threatening illness that affects many millions of  Americans, is really a group of diverse maladies rather than a single ailment, scientists have concluded from a large accumulation of evidence.

headline.main: Health; THE CATCH-22 OF ANTIPSYCHOTIC DRUGS

docs.abstract: Marion Steinmann article on tardive dyskinesia, a serious and bizarre disorder which occurs in many persons who have taken antipsychotic drugs over long period of time; says person afflicted with disorder is subject to grotesque involuntary movements of face or body (L)
